_header: Harkeneth all to this gospel / What Matthew hereof will us tell
Subjects: All Saints’, feast of; sermon texts, Gospel
_description: Gospel ‘In festo omnium sanctorum’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Herkeneþ alle to þis gospelWhat Matheu her of wol us
                    tel…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…To þat blisse he vs bringeÞat in world of worldus
                    is regninge Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Videns Ihesu turbas ascendit in montem (f.
                    226vc)
